scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix remend-ai-api" "cd remend-ai-app && npx expo start --port 8081"
scripts.dev-i: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix remend-ai-api" "cd remend-ai-app && npx expo start --ios --port 8081"
scripts.dev-a: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix remend-ai-api" "cd remend-ai-app && npx expo start --android --port 8081"
